ARABIC: فَمَا كَانَ دَعْوَىٰهُمْ إِذْ جَآءَهُم بَأْسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And their only utterance, when Our violent force came down upon them, was the cry: 'Truly we have been wrongdoers!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And when Our punishment overtook them they had nothing to say except crying out: "We have indeed been sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And when Our scourge fell upon them their only cry was: 'We are indeed transgressors.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When Our wrath struck them, they could do nothing but confess to their sins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore they uttered nothing when Our punishment came to them, except that they said, “Indeed we were the unjust.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: No cry did they utter when Our torment came upon them but this: "Verily, we were wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Yet their cry, when Our punishment came to them, was nothing but that they said: Surely we were unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and they but cried, when Our might came upon there, 'We were evildoers.';
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: No plea had they, when Our terror came unto them, save that they said: Lo! We were wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when Our scourge fell upon them, their only cry was, "We were indeed wrongdoers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then naught was their cry a when Our violence came upon them save that they said: verily we have been the wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then their cry, when Our punishment overtook them, was only that they said, ‘We have indeed been wrongdoers!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When (thus) Our punishment took them, no cry did they utter but this: "Indeed we did wrong."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: No cry did they utter when Our Torment came upon them but this: "Verily, we were Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.)".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when Our Might fell upon them they only said: 'We have indeed been harmdoers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When Our might came upon them, their only cry was, “We were indeed wrongdoers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And their declaration when Our punishment came to them was only that they said, "Indeed, we were wrongdoers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:5] And their only plea, their [only] words, when Our might came upon them, was to say, ‘We were evildoers indeed’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (No plea) words (had they, when Our terror) Our punishment which destroyed them (came unto them, save that they said: Lo! We were wrong-doers) idolaters.
